Sasori, with the [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[puppet]] uses [[Iron Sand World Method]] while Deidara adds his [[Explosive Clay|clay]] spiders on the needles that explode on the opponent, leaving the opponent poisoned.
